price: 19਼ ਬੇਸ਼ੱਕ ਇਹ (ਕੁਰਆਨ) ਇਕ ਨਸੀਹਤ ਹੈ, ਹੁਣ ਜੋ ਕੋਈ ਚਾਹਵੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਰਾਹ ਫੜ ਲਵੇ।
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
